channel.title: Openwisp on sunyuesimida's workbook
channel.description: Recent content in Openwisp on sunyuesimida's workbook

item.title: Google Code-in with OpenWISP
item.description: Recently I’ve been participating in Google Code-in which is Google’s initiative to introduce young minds to the concept of FOSS, that is Free or Open-Source Softwares. This post is for sharing my experiences with GCI, as the title suggests. So let’s just get on it. It all began while I was returning from an outing on 5 December, 2017 and was searching the internet for Google Science Fair to check if I could participate in it or not.
